intro: This document serves as a comprehensive nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's Coastal Zones (CZ) product, a local land monitoring service. It provides detailed descriptions of all Level 5 land cover and land use classes within the CZ nomenclature. The guide elucidates the geographic characteristics of each class, specifies the input datasets used for interpretation, and outlines relevant methods for accurate classification. This nomenclature is designed to be compatible with existing European land cover products and the MAES ecosystem typology.
